summary: My Recolour Of The Ancient Nord Weapons Set.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like the way that the Ancient Nord Swords, which are the most powerful weapons in the game looked. Yes they are \" Ancient \", but I don\'t think that rusted swords would be that powerful, so I gave them a make-over!

All of the wooden handles / grips have been replaced with new flexible, polished ones. The metal has been totally redone and sharpened a few times and now the steel looks brand new!

UPDATE: After Much Fiddling Around With Recolouring And Plug-Ins, I Finally Managed To Make Them Look Darker Without Ruining The Rest. Hope You Like :)

Read The \" ReadMe! \" To See The Effects Used.

For My Other Files Look-Up \" Els236 \" In The Search Bar!
author: Els236
